0.questionaire: Lam-Ang sees a hunter about to kill a frightened rooster. He wants to convince the hunter to let the rooster go. What should  you say?

options.ilocano: Kayatko nga kanen atoy nga manok.
options.translation: I want to eat this chicken.

options.ilocano: Saan mo nga diswan ata nga manok ta  nasirib ata nga manok.
options.translation: Donâ€™t hit that rooster because it is a wise one.

options.ilocano: Isu daytoy ti napili a taraon ti Igorot!
options.translation: This is the chosen meal of the Igorots!

options.ilocano: Kayatko laeng ti pumatay ti manok.
options.translation: I just want to kill a rooster.
